ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Zeb server maturing?
ygData.msgSnippet: Great Question. I think POP did change some things, one of which is that people don t hang at Druid rings anymore waiting for ports.  So here I am a level 14
ygData.messageBody:
Great Question.

I think POP did change some things, one of which is
that people don't hang at Druid rings anymore waiting
for ports. So here I am a level 14 warrior wanting a
port so I go to WC and kill some Dervs while waiting
for a port. Now, I just run my tail to Freeport and
take a book.

I think this is more in line of what we are seeing, I
play on Druzzil and see the same types of scenarios.

Good Luck

--- mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:
> I popped into West Commons my last two sessions to
> see if I could bag
> a giant. Just wanted to come back to the zone and do
> that, since now
> I can. The place is so empty! Back when I was a teen
> it was busy,
> laggy and fun. It is deserted now.
>
> I have to wonder, are there very few real noobs
> these days? Has POP
> changed the demographics in Norath? Places that were
> good fun and
> fellowship are dead. Even Velious is starting to
> seem empty. Are all
> of the players getting into the high levels and now
> living in the
> Planes?
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
>
